message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but $150 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  Would you be open to $110?
I understand you're looking to save a bit of money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $130?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. $130 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm happy to pay $120, which is fair to both of us. Let me know what you think.
